languages.text: {n}В сознание вторгается неслышимый, но от того не менее оглушительный звук. Барабанные перепонки готовы взорваться. Единственный звук, который вы слышите теперь — стрекот конечностей ксеноса и его ледяной голос.{/n} "Откажись от иллюзии выбора. Ты исполнишь мою волю. И если ты прекратишь сопротивляться и будешь вести себя как хороший образец, в перспективе ты даже можешь рассчитывать на мою помощь в побеге из Комморры".

{n}An inaudible yet deafening sound invades your mind. Your eardrums are ready to burst. The only sound you can hear is the xenos's limbs chittering and his ice-cold voice.{/n} "Abandon any illusion of choice. You will do my will. And, if you stop resisting and start behaving like a good specimen, you may eventually receive my help in escaping Commorragh."
languages.original_text: {n}В сознание вторгается неслышимый, но от того не менее оглушительный звук. Барабанные перепонки готовы взорваться. Единственный звук, который вы слышите теперь — стрекот конечностей ксеноса и его ледяной голос.{/n} "Откажись от иллюзии выбора. Ты исполнишь мою волю. И если ты прекратишь сопротивляться и будешь вести себя как хороший образец, в перспективе ты даже можешь рассчитывать на мою помощь в побеге из Комморры".

traits.locale_text: {n}An inaudible yet deafening sound invades your mind. Your eardrums are about to burst. The only sound you can hear right now is the chittering of the xenos's limbs and his ice-cold voice.{/n} "Abandon the illusion of choice. You will carry out my will. And, if you stop resisting and start behaving like a good specimen, you might eventually come to expect my assistance in your escape from Commorragh."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}An inaudible yet deafening sound invades your mind. Your eardrums are about to burst. traits.locale_text: {n}An inaudible yet deafening sound invades your mind. Your eardrums are ready to burst. The only sound you can hear is the xenos's limbs chittering and his ice-cold voice.{/n} "Abandon any illusion of choice. You will do my will. And, if you stop resisting and start behaving like a good specimen, you may eventually receive my help in escaping Commorragh."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Un son inaudible, mais assourdissant envahit votre esprit. Vos tympans sont prêts à exploser. Vous ne percevez plus que les bruits de frottement des membres chitineux du xénos, et sa voix froide comme la glace.{/n} « Renoncez à toute illusion de choix. Votre volonté est mienne. Et si vous cessez de résister pour vous comporter comme un bon spécimen, je vous aiderai un jour à fuir Commorragh. »
languages.original_text: {n}An inaudible yet deafening sound invades your mind. Your eardrums are ready to burst. The only sound you can hear is the xenos's limbs chittering and his ice-cold voice.{/n} "Abandon any illusion of choice. You will do my will. And, if you stop resisting and start behaving like a good specimen, you may eventually receive my help in escaping Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un son inaudible, mais assourdissant envahit votre esprit. Vos tympans sont prêts à exploser. Vous ne percevez plus que les bruits de frottement des membres chitineux du xénos, et sa voix froide comme la glace.{/n} « Renoncez à toute illusion de choix. Votre volonté est mienne. Et si vous cessez de résister pour vous comporter comme un bon spécimen, je vous aiderai un jour à fuir Commorragh. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}某种你听不到的声音侵入了你的脑海，发出了震耳欲聋的轰鸣，仿佛要把你的耳膜震破。你能听到的只有那个异形肢体发出的咯吱声，以及他冰冷的声音。{/n}“放弃一切自由的幻想吧，你要遵从我的意志。而且，如果你停止反抗，做出让我满意的表现，说不定我最后真的会帮你逃出科摩罗，猴子。”
languages.original_text: {n}An inaudible yet deafening sound invades your mind. Your eardrums are ready to burst. The only sound you can hear is the xenos's limbs chittering and his ice-cold voice.{/n} "Abandon any illusion of choice. You will do my will. And, if you stop resisting and start behaving like a good specimen, you may eventually receive my help in escaping Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: {n}某种你听不到的声音侵入了你的脑海，发出了震耳欲聋的轰鸣，仿佛要把你的耳膜震破。你能听到的只有那个异形肢体发出的咯吱声，以及他冰冷的声音。{/n}“放弃一切自由的幻想吧，你要遵从我的意志。而且，如果你停止反抗，做出让我满意的表现，说不定我最后真的会帮你逃出科摩罗，猴子。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Ein nicht zu hörender und doch ohrenbetäubender Klang dringt in deinen Verstand ein. Deine Trommelfelle stehen kurz vor dem Platzen. Das einzige Geräusch, das du hören kannst, ist das Geklacker der Glieder des Xenos sowie seine eiskalte Stimme.{/n} "Lasst jede Illusion der Wahlmöglichkeit fahren. Ihr werdet meinen Willen befolgen. Und wenn Ihr aufhört, Euch zur Wehr zu setzen, und Euch wie ein braves Versuchsstück benehmt, dann helfe ich Euch irgendwann, aus Commorragh zu entkommen."
languages.original_text: {n}An inaudible yet deafening sound invades your mind. Your eardrums are ready to burst. The only sound you can hear is the xenos's limbs chittering and his ice-cold voice.{/n} "Abandon any illusion of choice. You will do my will. And, if you stop resisting and start behaving like a good specimen, you may eventually receive my help in escaping Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein nicht zu hörender und doch ohrenbetäubender Klang dringt in deinen Verstand ein. Deine Trommelfelle stehen kurz vor dem Platzen. Das einzige Geräusch, das du hören kannst, ist das Geklacker der Glieder des Xenos sowie seine eiskalte Stimme.{/n} "Lasst jede Illusion der Wahlmöglichkeit fahren. Ihr werdet meinen Willen befolgen. Und wenn Ihr aufhört, Euch zur Wehr zu setzen, und Euch wie ein braves Versuchsstück benehmt, dann helfe ich Euch irgendwann, aus Commorragh zu entkommen."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Un sonido inaudible pero ensordecedor invade tu mente. Sientes que tus tímpanos están a punto de estallar. El único sonido que alcanzas a oír son las extremidades del xenos repiqueteando y su gélida voz.{/n} «Abandona cualquier esperanza de poder elegir lo que hacer. Harás lo que yo te diga. Si dejas de oponer resistencia y te empiezas a comportar como un buen espécimen, puede que te ayude a escapar de Commorragh».
languages.original_text: {n}An inaudible yet deafening sound invades your mind. Your eardrums are ready to burst. The only sound you can hear is the xenos's limbs chittering and his ice-cold voice.{/n} "Abandon any illusion of choice. You will do my will. And, if you stop resisting and start behaving like a good specimen, you may eventually receive my help in escaping Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sonido inaudible pero ensordecedor invade tu mente. Sientes que tus tímpanos están a punto de estallar. El único sonido que alcanzas a oír son las extremidades del xenos repiqueteando y su gélida voz.{/n} «Abandona cualquier esperanza de poder elegir lo que hacer. Harás lo que yo te diga. Si dejas de oponer resistencia y te empiezas a comportar como un buen espécimen, puede que te ayude a escapar de Commorragh».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}不可聴だが耳をつんざくような音があなたの心を侵す。鼓膜が破裂しそうだ。聞こえるのは、異種族の手足がビリビリと震える音と、氷のように冷たい声だけだ。{/n}「選択の幻想を捨てろ。私の意志に従うのだ。お前が抵抗するのをやめて、良い標本のように振る舞い始めれば、コモラフから逃れる手助けをしてやれるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: {n}An inaudible yet deafening sound invades your mind. Your eardrums are ready to burst. The only sound you can hear is the xenos's limbs chittering and his ice-cold voice.{/n} "Abandon any illusion of choice. You will do my will. And, if you stop resisting and start behaving like a good specimen, you may eventually receive my help in escaping Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: {n}不可聴だが耳をつんざくような音があなたの心を侵す。鼓膜が破裂しそうだ。聞こえるのは、異種族の手足がビリビリと震える音と、氷のように冷たい声だけだ。{/n}「選択の幻想を捨てろ。私の意志に従うのだ。お前が抵抗するのをやめて、良い標本のように振る舞い始めれば、コモラフから逃れる手助けをしてやれるかもしれない」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Duyulamayan ama aynı zamanda sağır edici olan bir ses, beynini istila ediyor. Kulak zarlarının patlayacağını sanıyorsun. Bir tek zenonun uzuvlarının çıtırtısıyla buz gibi soğuk sesini duyuyorsun.{/n} "Seçim şansın olduğu fikrini bir kenara bırak. İstediğimi yapacaksın. Direnmeyi bırakır da iyi bir numune gibi davranmaya başlarsan zamanla Commorragh'tan kaçmana yardım etmem mümkün olabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}An inaudible yet deafening sound invades your mind. Your eardrums are ready to burst. The only sound you can hear is the xenos's limbs chittering and his ice-cold voice.{/n} "Abandon any illusion of choice. You will do my will. And, if you stop resisting and start behaving like a good specimen, you may eventually receive my help in escaping Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Duyulamayan ama aynı zamanda da sağır edici olan bir ses beynini istila ediyor. Kulak zarların patlamak üzere. Duyabildiğin tek ses, zenonun uzuvlarının çıtırtısı ve onun buz gibi soğuk sesi.{/n} "Seçim şansın olduğu fikrini bir kenara bırak. İstediğimi yapacaksın. Ve direnmeyi bırakır da iyi bir numune gibi davranmaya başlarsan, zaman içinde Commorragh'tan kaçmana yardım bile edebilirim."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
